ModMetaData.name: SmallSolarsStuffed
ModMetaData.author: Skullywag
ModMetaData.description:
Adds multpile sized, smaller than the vanilla solar panels that can be made with stuff.
MICRO 3X3 Energy Health Flammable Beauty Steel panel: 1300W 225 20% -10 Silver panel: 1400W 158 20% -10 Gold panel: 1500W 135 20% -10 Plasteel panel: 1700W 630 10% -10 Uranium panel: 1800W 560 0% -10
MINI 2X2 Steel panel: 560W 100 20% -10 Silver panel: 600W 70 20% -10 Gold panel: 640W 60 20% -10 Plasteel panel: 700W 280 10% -10 Uranium panel: 740W 250 0% -10
SINGLE 1X1 Steel panel: 135W 25 20% -10 Silver panel: 145W 18 20% -10 Gold panel: 155W 15 20% -10 Plasteel panel: 165W 70 10% -10 Uranium panel: 175W 62 0% -10
